channel.title: Stuck on next step-sincere
channel.description:
I have another topic i want you to delete the other I have wamp and JDK and i am up to the part where it says that I need to register a username at http://localhost/www
when i go to that it says error 404 link not valid
but when i go back it says under my projects
*
Your Projects
No projects yet. To create a new one, just create a directory in 'www'.
Where cann I find my www folder?!!? Please help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 11:43:01 pm[/size][hr]for some reason I cant edit but this is what it says
when i got to http://localhost/www
Not Found
The requested URL /www was not found on this server.

item.title: Stuck on next step-sincere
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:10, topic:247967”]haha ok so i got the hint i put the www folder inside wamp but i edited compile.bat and run.bat to where i dowloaded apache and jdk which was on the desktop, but once i open run.bat it says that ‘ant’ was not recognized as an internal or external command, so i rechecked the destination and its all the same.

Help Please?[/quote]

Please refer to this topic

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck on next step-sincere
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

haha ok so i got the hint i put the www folder inside wamp but i edited compile.bat and run.bat to where i dowloaded apache and jdk which was on the desktop, but once i open run.bat it says that ‘ant’ was not recognized as an internal or external command, so i rechecked the destination and its all the same.

Help Please?

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck on next step-sincere
item.dc:creator: @Jonesy1128 Jonesy1128
item.description:
@Jonesy1128 wrote:

I’ma give you a clue. The directory’s name is www. I’ma give you another clue; you are using WAMP to host.

I could just tell you; in much fewer words, but this way you’ll learn.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck on next step-sincere
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“Stashah, post:6, topic:247967”]Hint: install a webserver, like wamp. There is a www folder inside which you can connect to by http://localhost .[/quote]“The requested URL /www was not found on this server.” Suggests that he already has a web server running, just the directory he specified doesn’t exist.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck on next step-sincere

item.description:
@Stashah wrote:
